nodes.text: Bubo Wamba Family Farms was a farming business located on Batuu, and was connected to the Milk Stand in the planet's Black Spire Outpost, where they held the monopoly on blue milk. Some residents of Batuu raised banthas for the farm, which produced the blue milk they sold, while the farms' green milk was imported and came from thala-sirens, which could be found on a number of worlds. The Milk Stand was founded by Aqualish dairy farmer Bubo Wamba, whose family had farmed banthas on Tatooine for four generations.

Articles released on the Disney Parks Blog prior to the opening of Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge revealed the in-universe story detail that the Milk Stand sells milk fresh from the Bubo Wamba Family Farms, and that it sells the Bubo Wamba Family Farms Novelty Drink Vessel which real-world customers can purcahse.
